DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The Drivers module has inferred that the current function is a DRIVER_INITIALIZE function: This is informational only. No problem has been detected.
The function being assigned or passed should be a DRIVER_UNLOAD function: Add the declaration 'DRIVER_UNLOAD UnloadRoutine;' before the current first declaration of UnloadRoutine.
The function 'UnloadRoutine' has been declared to be in a paged segment, but neither PAGED_CODE nor PAGED_CODE_LOCKED was found.
